adc.desc: add operand to accumulator with carry bit

asl.desc: shift bits left with incoming zero and outgoing carry bit

beq.desc: branch if the Z status bit is set

bit.desc: set status by bitwise AND of accumulator with memory, without changing accumulator

bmi.desc: branch if the N status bit is set

bne.desc: branch if the Z status bit is not set

bpl.desc: branch if the N status bit is not set

brk.desc: branch if the Z status bit is set

bvc.desc: branch if the V status bit is not set

bvs.desc: branch if the V status bit is set

cmp.desc: compare accumulator with memory and set status bits

cpx.desc: compare X index with memory and set status bits

cpy.desc: compare Y index with memory and set status bits

dec.desc: decrement memory or accumulator (65c02) by one

inc.desc: increment memory or accumulator (65c02) by one

lsr.desc: shift bits right with incoming zero and outgoing carry bit

phb.desc: push data bank register on stack

phk.desc: push program bank register on stack

plb.desc: pull data bank register from stack

rol.desc: rotate bits left, new bit 0 = old carry, new carry = old bit 7

ror.desc: rotate bits right, new bit 7 = old carry, new carry = old bit 0

sbc.desc: subtract memory from accumulator with borrow

tcd.desc: transfer C accumulator to direct register

tcs.desc: transfer C accumulator to stack pointer

tdc.desc: transfer direct register to C accumulator

trb.desc: test and reset memory bits with accumulator

tsb.desc: test and set memory bits with accumulator

tsc.desc: transfer stack pointer to C accumulator

tsx.desc: transfer stack pointer to X index

txs.desc: transfer X index to stack pointer

txy.desc: transfer X index to Y index

tyx.desc: transfer Y index to X index
